thread.title: Twitter grieves for first Strictly Come Dancing casualty Iwan Thomas as he's voted out with Ola Jordan
thread.title_full: Twitter grieves for first Strictly Come Dancing casualty Iwan Thomas as he's voted out with Ola Jordan

title: Twitter grieves for first Strictly Come Dancing casualty Iwan Thomas as he's voted out with Ola Jordan
text:
Twitter grieves for first Strictly Come Dancing casualty Iwan Thomas as he's voted out with Ola Jordan Twitter grieves for first Strictly Come Dancing casualty Iwan Thomas as he's voted out with Ola Jordan 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Twitter was in mourning for Iwan Thomas as he became the first celebrity voted off Strictly Come Dancing in 2015. 
Former Olympian Iwan and his professional partner Ola Jordan landed bottom of the judges‚Äô leaderboard after their first two dances and the public vote didn‚Äôt see them fare any better. (BBC) 
Iwan ended up in a dance-off against Loose Women panellist and pop star Jamelia and her partner Tristan MacManus, as the two celebrities scored the lowest number of combined votes. 
The athlete-turned-sports commentator, 41, and Ola performed the Cha Cha to Sexy And I Know It by LMFAO, which Bruno Tonioli branded ‚Äúmurder‚Äù and earned just 13 points. (BBC) 
Despite Iwan evidently not being the best dancer in the competition, viewers took to Twitter to lament his exit and that of fan favourite Ola. 
This is the first time Ola has left the competition in week one. She feared she might not make it to the latest series at all after suffering a serious knee injury when she took part in winter sports show The Jump. Sorry not replying individually I'm reading all tweets & touched by nice comments‚Ä¶ I truly gave it everything & felt was improving #Gutted 
‚Äî Iwan Thomas MBE (@Iwanrunner) October 4, 2015 Thank you so much for all your support for me and @Iwanrunner I loved dancing with Iwan and I am going to miss him so much.Great guy ‚Ä¶üò¢ 
‚Äî Ola Jordan (@The_OlaJordan) October 4, 2015 RT & say goodbye to @Iwanrunner ! He didn't go the distance as he raced to the finish line but he had a great time! https://t.co/sioBsCxVB4 
‚Äî BBC Strictly (@bbcstrictly) October 4, 2015 
Ola‚Äôs husband James led the Twitter tributes to Strictly‚Äôs first fallen pair. Im so proud of @The_OlaJordan After her injury just to get back on Strictly was a massive thing.And she's made another friend @Iwanrunner 
‚Äî James Jordan (@The_JamesJordan) October 4, 2015 
As did presenter Chris Hollins who won Strictly in 2009 with Ola. I'm on a train to Devon but reading that @The_OlaJordan has gone out! What a bloody shame. You are and always will be the best! Xxxx 
‚Äî Chris Hollins (@chrishollinsTV) October 4, 2015 
And fans were up in arms about their exit. Can't believe @The_OlaJordan is eliminated week one! No more @bbcstrictly for me this year! #Strictly #scd 
‚Äî Darren Ruback (@Darren_Ruback) October 4, 2015 Such a shame @The_OlaJordan is now gone from strictly, such determination after her injury to get back in the saddle will be missed X
